_source.text: A blog by journalists who covered the election at the U.K.'s Guardian took a dig at Romney in an item entitled, "Olympic levels of Schadenfreude": "The London Olympics went rather better than Mitt Romney's presidential campaign," the Guardian bloggers noted, referring to Romney's July visit to London, when he infuriated the British by implying they weren't well prepared for the Games.
